name: NEO PHILANTHROPY
description: Nonprofit intermediary - fiscal sponsor to Resilience Force.
sampleDescriptions: Supporting workers responding to natural disasters and climate change with a publicly-funded jobs program, labor standards, health and safety standards and special immigration status for climate resil
